smsFormat.regex_Format: (?i).*Your (?:A/c|account) no. (ending with )?[[account]] (?:is|has been) debited for (?:INR |Rs\.)[[amount]] on [[date]] [[time]] and credited to (?:VPA|a/c no.) [[to]] \(UPI Ref.*
(?i).*Your (?:A/c|account) no. (ending with )?[[account]] (?:is|has been) debited for (?:INR |Rs\.)[[amount]] on [[date]] [[time]] towards [[to]](?:\.|- ?S).*
(?i).*Your (?:A/c|account) no. (ending with )?[[account]] (?:is|has been) credited with (?:INR |Rs\.)[[amount]] on [[date]]( [[time]])? towards [[to]](?:\.| ?- ?S).*
